name: name
description: Description: The name of your application.

name: website OPTIONAL
description: Description: The website associated with your application.

name: vapid_key
description: Description: Used for Push Streaming API. Returned with POST /api/v1/apps. Equivalent to WebPushSubscription#server_key

name: client_id OPTIONAL
description: Description: Client ID key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

name: client_secret OPTIONAL
description: Description: Client secret key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens
